member.name: ID2D1Factory6.CreateDevice
member.summary: Creates a new Direct2D device from the given IDXGIDevice.
member.param: The IDXGIDevice to create the Direct2D device from.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1Factory6
member.summary: Creates Direct2D resources. This interface also enables the creation of ID2D1Device5 objects.
